description:
Toudou Yurika is an idol who portrays herself as a vampire in public. She claims to be over 600 years old, http://anidb.net/ch73415 [Dracula]`s descendant, and Carmilla`s daughter.
Note: Carmilla is a female vampire and the title character of a 1871-72 Gothic novella by Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu and one of the early works of vampire fiction, predating Bram Stoker`s Dracula, published in 1897, by a quarter of century, and being one of the major influences upon the latter.
name: Toudou Yurika
